metadata.feature_description: Display featured posts in a responsive card layout with customizable appearance

steps.action: Navigate to News page where Publisher module displays featured posts
steps.expected: Featured posts grid should be displayed with Featured section header
steps.actual: Featured section displayed with red header labeled 'Featured' and post cards in grid layout

steps.expected: Card should display title, date, author, and summary
steps.actual: Featured card displays: Title 'Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review', Date '12/30/2025', Author 'Test User2', Summary text about publishing workflow

steps.action: View featured posts at desktop resolution (1280x720)
steps.expected: Cards should display in desktop layout with 50% width
steps.actual: Desktop layout displayed correctly with cards at approximately 50% width

steps.expected: Cards should switch to full-width mobile layout
steps.actual: Mobile layout displayed correctly with full-width cards, hamburger menu, and responsive navigation

steps.expected: Card should show pointer cursor indicating clickability
steps.actual: Card shows cursor:pointer on hover, indicating it is clickable

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to post detail from card

steps.expected: Should navigate to post detail page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to post detail page at /News/Test-Workflow-Post-Submit-for-Review showing full post content with breadcrumb, title, date, content, and author info

steps.action: Examine featured post card background image
steps.expected: Card should display background image or default placeholder
steps.actual: Featured card displays default placeholder image (book/document icon on light blue background) as no custom image was set for the post

steps.action: Check Publisher Settings panel for featured post configuration
steps.expected: Settings panel should be accessible showing configuration options
steps.actual: Publisher Settings panel is accessible showing workflow selection and sharing options. Featured post limit appears to be configured at module level - currently showing 1 featured post as expected

steps.action: Check featured post card for comment count display
steps.expected: Comment count should be displayed if comments are enabled
steps.actual: No comment count visible on featured post cards. Code supports Disqus integration for comment counts, but feature appears to be disabled or not configured

issues: Comment count not displayed - Disqus integration may not be configured or comments disabled for posts

observations: Code suggests comment count feature exists via Disqus integration (disqus-comment-count class in Featured.ascx), but no UI element visible to test it - likely requires Disqus configuration
Featured post limit settings are handled at module configuration level, not visible in the Publisher Settings panel shown on the page
The Featured Posts Display uses CardViewManager.js for interactive features like pagination and search filtering
Mobile responsive layout correctly switches from desktop cards (50% width) to mobile cards (100% width) at 640px breakpoint as defined in featured.css
